ordinary.name: Ordinary
ordinary.description: No special traits. Just a regular survivor.

spiritRoot.name: Radiation Resistant
spiritRoot.description: Natural resistance to radiation. +10% experience gain.

ironBone.name: Iron Bones
ironBone.description: Dense bone structure. Increased defense and endurance.

sharpBlade.name: Born Fighter
sharpBlade.description: Natural combat instincts. Increased attack power.

spiritSense.name: Keen Senses
spiritSense.description: Heightened awareness. Increased perception and agility.

fastCultivation.name: Fast Adapter
fastCultivation.description: Adapts quickly to radiation. +15% experience gain.

immortalBody.name: Radiation Absorber
immortalBody.description: Your body absorbs radiation. Greatly increased health and defense.

swordHeart.name: Weapon Master
swordHeart.description: Innate mastery of weapons. Greatly increased attack.

thunderBody.name: Electric
thunderBody.description: Your body generates electricity. Increased attack, speed, and perception.

dragonBlood.name: Mutant Blood
dragonBlood.description: Powerful mutant genes. Greatly increased health and endurance.

genius.name: Prodigy
genius.description: Exceptional adaptation potential. Greatly increased experience gain.

blessed.name: Fortune's Child
blessed.description: Blessed by fate. Increased luck and experience.

luckystar.name: Chosen One
luckystar.description: Destiny's favorite. Massively increased luck and experience.

immortalKing.name: Alpha Strain
immortalKing.description: Carries the ultimate mutation. All stats massively increased.

chaosBody.name: Omega Strain
chaosBody.description: The perfect mutation. All stats and experience greatly increased.

nascentSoul.name: Wasteland Legend
nascentSoul.description: A legendary figure in the new world.

immortal.name: Radiation God
immortal.description: An immortal being of pure energy.

warrior.name: Combat Set
warrior.description: Wearing all combat titles grants massive combat bonuses.

explorer.name: Explorer Set
explorer.description: Wearing all explorer titles increases exploration rewards.

collector.name: Collector Set
collector.description: Wearing all collector titles greatly increases luck.
